about_the_game:
Supermarket Simulator Holidays 2025 puts you in the heart of the festive season, where you get to build and manage your very own holiday store from scratch. Create the ultimate shopping destination filled with plushies, figurines, Christmas cards, and decorations, and design every corner to reflect the holiday spirit.

Start with a small space, then expand and customize your layout to maximize your store's potential. Stock your shelves with the best holiday items, hire and manage staff to keep the operations running smoothly, and help customers find everything they need for the holidays.

As you grow, collect rare cards and display them to increase your profits, or set up play areas to keep customers entertained and boost engagement. Keep an eye on your customers, making sure the store remains lively without overcrowding.

Supermarket Simulator Holidays 2025 is your chance to build the ultimate festive store, manage your business, and spread holiday cheer. Just remember: the only thing more important than stocking up on decorations is keeping your elves (er, employees) happy!

As you grow, collect rare cards and display them to increase your profits, or set up play areas to keep customers entertained and boost engagement. Keep an eye on your customers, making sure the store remains lively without overcrowding.

Supermarket Simulator Holidays 2025 is your chance to build the ultimate festive store, manage your business, and spread holiday cheer. Just remember: the only thing more important than stocking up on decorations is keeping your elves (er, employees) happy!
name: Supermarket Simulator Holidays 2025

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7, 8, 10, 11
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD, 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11 compatible graphics card
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Supermarket Simulator Holidays 2025 lets you build and manage your own festive store. Stock plushies, figurines, Christmas cards, and decorations, expand your space, hire staff, and keep customers happy. Grow profits with rare cards and play areas—just don’t forget your elves! 🎄✨
